name: My Way
description:
My entry for the first microStudio '1-Click' Mini Jam.

Lil'Marvin is a service robot with an attitude.
When he gets into a bad mood he just shuts down his external sensors, 
activates his walking cycle and doesn't give a shoot what he bumps into. 

At least we still have remote access to his gravity jump,
let's see if we will be able to control him that way.  

Your Mission ... should you decidee to accept it:  
Guide Lil'Marvin to all the switches to activate them. Once done a portal will open, reach it to enter the next room.

Instructions:

Press [SPACE] or [click/tap] the screen to make Lil'Marvin jump.

  • activate all switches by running into/hitting them
  • make your way to the activated portal  

Game Link

Good Luck & Have Fun
